cause.description:
Haven't we all suffered because of dumb people? I know I have. Definition: "Dumb" - to lack common sense. To do dumb things because of a lack of wisdom, information or just not caring.
1. Not all people are born with common sense.
2. People without common sense are dangerous to everyone, including themselves
3. Dumb people in positions of power and previlege ( including parenting and politics) should be regulated.
4. No dumb people should work at a "drive through"
5. No dumb people should lead a country
cause.mission: Protect ourselves from dumb people and the dumb things they do.
cause.name: Save us from Dumb People International
